content.rendered:
Introducing

Kingmaker

Our flagship casino and sports brand themed around making Kings of our players. With a bespoke acquisition and loyalty program focused on mega jackpots, players are awarded multiple opportunities daily to win big and join the ranks of the elite!

Over 8500+ games
Industry leading jackpots
Custom loyalty Program
Visit kingmaker

Verticals

Casino, Sportsbook.

Supported Languages

English, German, Finnish, Norwegian, Italian, Czech, French, Hungarian, Polish, Spanish.

Supported Currencies

EUR, CAD, NOK, HUF, RUB, USD, BRL, CZI, AUD, NZD, INR, CHF, PLN, CL, PEN, TRY.

Customer Support

24 Hours a day, 7 days a week via Live Chat and Email.

VIP Benefits

Dedicated Personal VIP Manager, Negotiable Withdrawal Limits, Private Parties, Exclusive Trips, Personalised Offers,  Regular Cashback, 24/7 Live Support Access.

Promotions

Casino Welcome Offer

 100% up to €500 + 25 Jackpot Free Spins

Sportsbook Welcome Offer

100% up to €100

Additional Promotions

Regular Cashback, Jackpot Free Spins, Reload Offers, Casino Tournaments, Leaderboard Races, Risk Free Bets, Boosted Odds, Early Payout, Bore Draw Bets, Accumulator Boost. 

License

join us

Dive into a world where the brands you promote are crafted with intelligence, your revenue in mind and style.

Sportsbook

Service your players properly with our fully fledged online sportsbook offering in excess of 600,000 pre-match events, 500,000 live events and 200,000 virtuals. Give your players the best with our unique bet builder and partial cashout functionality designed to extend engagement even further.

Tennis
Soccer
Basketball
Boxing
Table Tennis
Hockey
Football
Golf

Sign up and start earning today!

promote us
